title: Century City 2BR+Den 2BA Apt w/ Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: ['Century City 2 Bedroom+Den 2 Bath Apartment', 'This Century City 2 bedroom+den 2 bath apartment features huge living room/dining room, separate breakfast nook, many rich cabinets throughout, large bedrooms, extra study/den area, in-unit washer dryer, recessed lighting throughout living room, kitchen, and den.', 'Silton Century City is a timeless apartment community located in Century City.', 'We offer well-appointed Studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom floor plans designed with your needs in mind.', 'If you want to live near the heart of Century City, you’ll love our location.', 'Shop, dine, and recharge immediately outside your front door at the Westfield Century City Mall.', 'Own the moment and enjoy the outdoors at Century Park or explore the latest exhibit at the Annenberg Space for Photography.', 'Plus, treat yourself to everyday conveniences like Gelson’s, Ralphs, Eataly and the weekly Farmers Market.', 'Curious about living at Silton Century City?', 'Book an in-person or virtual tour today with one of our friendly and knowledgeable leasing associates at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Visit our website at <URL>', 'Apartment Features:', 'Dual Master Suites', 'Dark Walnut Flooring', 'In-Unit Washer/Dryer', 'Cozy Gas Fireplace', 'Study/Den Area', 'Large Roman Tubs', 'Custom Oak Built-in Cabinetry', 'Recessed Lighting', 'Stainless Steel Appliances (Refrigerator / Microwave / Dishwasher / Stove)', 'Huge Walk-in Closet', 'Rich Cabinets Throughout', 'Large Skylight', 'Granite Countertops', 'Community Amenities:', '1/2 Block from Century City Mall', 'Courtyard', 'Rooftop Deck', 'Controlled Access/Gated', 'Nice Size Patio', 'Elevator', '2 Parking Spaces (Covered & Gated)', 'Residential Secluded Area', 'Excellent School District', '10275 Missouri Avenue', 'Los Angeles, CA 90025', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated in real-time, however, conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
